translation: n.果酱n.堵塞；拥挤；困境v.塞满；挤；卡住；夹伤；干扰；猛压
examples: (1) He spread some apple jam on the bread.(2) I reached across the table for the jam.(3) Traffic jams in the town happen everyday.(4) We were delayed in a traffic jam.(5) They detoured around the traffic jam by heading south.(6) How am I going to get out of this jam?(7) The holiday traffic is jamming the roads.(8) The key turned halfway and then jammed.(9) He got his finger jammed in the door.(10) The government tried to jam the guerrillas' telecommunication.(11) I had to jam an the brakes sharply to avoid hitting two children
(1) 他在面包上涂上苹果酱。(2) 我伸手到桌子那端去拿果酱。(3) 城里的交通天天堵塞。(4) 我们因交通拥挤而迟到了。(5) 他们朝南绕过交通拥挤的人群。(6) 我怎样才能摆脱困境呢？(7) 假日的车辆堵塞了交通。(8) 钥匙转了一半就卡住了。(9) 他的手指被门夹伤了。(10) 政府设法干扰游击队的无线电通讯。(11) 我必须猛地踩刹车，以免撞上两上孩子。

translation: n.广口瓶；坛子；刺耳声；震动vi.发刺耳声；不协调；震荡；冲突vt.扰乱；震动
examples: (1) I can't get the lid off this jar.(2) The jar contains ten glasses of water.(3) I need a jar to make the krauts.(4) He fashioned the clay into a jar.(5) The jar of the alarm woke me up.(6) The side of the boat hit the reef with a grinding jar.(7) The jar of the explosion was felt for miles around.(8) The iron gate jarred when he opened it.(9) His harsh criticism jarred with the friendly tone of the meeting.(10) The orange curtains jar with the red furniture.(11) The noise is beginning to jar on my nerves.(12) Their opinion jarred with ours.(13) The children's screams jar my nerves.(14) The decision will jar the country.

(1) 我打不开这广口瓶的盖子。(2) 这只大口瓶能装十杯水。(3) 我需要一个坛子做泡菜。(4) 他用粘土做成一个陶土罐子。(5) 闹钟的刺耳铃声把我吵醒了。(6) 船撞到礁石发出刺耳的声音。(7) 那次爆炸引起的震荡周围好几英里都能感觉到。(8) 他开门时，铁门发出刺耳的嘎嘎声。(9) 他批评得十分尖刻,与会议中的友好气氛很不协调。(10) 这橙色窗帘与红色的家具不协调。(11) 那部收音机,吵得我心神不安。(12) 他们的意见与我们不一致。(13) 孩子们的尖叫声使我神经不安。(14) 这项决定将震动这个国家。

translation: n.颚；颌；下巴；钳口；说教v.喋喋不休；教训
examples: (1) A strong square jaw is a sign of firm character.(2) He fell from a ladder, and broke his jaw bone.(3) Give him a sock on the jaw!(4) On hearing the news, his jaw dropped.(5) Broken pipes adopt a hacksaw or a saw without teeth.The size of pipe needing to cut should be exact.Put pipes on the center of pressure jaw, and keep fractures even.(6) Whenever my wife and her mother get together they jaw away for hours.(7) She jawed him all day about that.
(1) 强健的方颚是性格坚定的象征。(2) 他从梯子上掉了下来，摔伤了颌骨。(3) 给他下巴上来一拳！(4) 听到这个消息，他惊讶得张口结舌。(5) 断管采用钢锯或无齿锯，需断切的管子尺寸准确，将管子置于压力钳口中心卡紧，断口平齐。(6) 每当我妻子和她母亲相聚时，她们总要聊上数小时。(7) 她为那事数说了他一整天。

translation: n.爵士乐；空话；各种杂物vt.使有生气；以爵士风格演奏vi.跳爵士舞；奏爵士乐；游荡
examples: (1) She's potty about jazz.(2) I don't dig modern jazz.(3) Does jazz hold any appeal for you?(4) Jazz has never really turned me on.(5) She brought the food and all the jazz to go with it.(6) We need to jazz this room up a bit.(7) Do you want to jazz up your old products?(8) I don't like to jazz up the classics.
(1) 她迷上了爵士音乐。(2) 我不喜欢现代爵士乐。(3) 你对爵士乐有兴趣吗？(4) 我从未对爵士乐真正产生过兴趣。(5) 她把食物和所有的杂物都拿来。(6) 我们需要把这间屋子装饰一下使之更有生气。(7) 你想给你们的老产品添点生气吗?(8) 我不喜欢用爵士乐的形式来演奏古典乐曲。

translation: n.牛仔裤
examples: (1) Every other girl except me is wearing jeans.(2) He wears an oily old pair of jeans.(3) Both my sister and I like to wear jeans.(4) The jeans will shrink in the wash.(5) Will denim jeans ever go out of date?
(1) 除了我以外，其他姑娘都穿著牛仔裤。(2) 他穿着一条沾满油污的旧牛仔裤。(3) 我姐姐和我都喜欢穿牛仔裤。(4) 那些牛仔裤洗过以后会缩水。(5) 粗布牛仔裤会过时吗?

translation: n.喷气式飞机；喷口；喷射；喷气式发动机v.喷射；喷出；搭乘喷射式飞机
examples: (1) Developing the supersonic jet was quite an accomplishment.(2) The accident happened as the jet was about to take off.(3) He left on the jet plane.(4) Clean the gas jets on the cooker.(5) The pipe burst and jet of water shoot across the kitchen.(6) This new jet engine is superbly engineered.(7) An English engineer invented the jet engine.(8) The water jetted out.(9) Oil suddenly jetted out of rig number four.(10) The flame-thrower jetted out flames.(11) We will jet to Las Vegas for the weekend.

(1) 开发超音速喷气机是一项了不起的成就。(2) 喷气式飞机正要起飞时出了事故。(3) 他坐飞机离开了。(4) 把煤气炉的喷口弄干净。(5) 管子破了，水从厨房的这边喷到那边。(6) 这个新喷气式发动机的设计实属上乘。(7) 一位英国工程师发明了这种喷气式发动机。(8) 一股水喷涌而出。(9) 油突然从四号钻井中喷了出来。(10) 喷火器喷出火焰来。(11) 我们将乘坐喷气式飞机去拉斯维加斯度周末。

translation: n.宝石；受珍视的人或物
examples: (1) He examined the jewel with minuteness.(2) The jewel has a beautiful shimmer.(3) Just feel the weight of this jewel.(4) A jewel fell off her ring and she could find neither hide nor hair of it.(5) The book is the jewel of his collection.(6) The talented man was the jewel of this company.
(1) 他仔细地检视宝石。(2) 那颗宝石有美丽的闪光。(3) 把这颗宝石拿在手看看它有多重。(4) 一颗宝石从她的戒指上脱落了，她四下找，却杳无踪迹。(5) 这本书是他藏书中最珍贵的一本。(6) 这位富有才华的人是这个公司的珍宝。

translation: n.珠宝；珠宝类
examples: (1) This is a case with separate compartments for shoes, jewelry, etc.(2) I bought the watch at the jewelry counter.(3) The gang knocked over a jewelry store.(4) All the jewelry went to her heirs.(5) My aunt bequeathed me all her jewelry.
(1) 这是一个分格存放鞋、珠宝等的箱子。(2) 这只表是我在珠宝柜买的。(3) 这伙歹徒抢劫了一家珠宝店。(4) 所有的珠宝都由她的继承人所有(5) 我姑妈把她所有的珠宝都遗赠给我了。

translation: v.慢跑；轻推；（使）颠簸前行n.慢跑；轻推；颠簸
examples: (1) He goes jogging every night.(2) You jogged my elbow and spoiled what I was drawing.(3) The wagon jogged along on the rough road.(4) I go for a jog in the park every morning.(5) I gave him a jog to wake him up.
(1) 他每晚慢跑。(2) 你撞到了我的手肘，弄坏了我正在画的图画。(3) 马车沿着崎岖不平的道路颠簸前行。(4) 每天早晨我在公园里慢跑。(5) 我轻轻推他一下,把他弄醒。

translation: n.欢乐；喜悦；乐趣；[大写] 乔伊(女子名)v.高兴；喜悦
examples: (1) He is in immeasurable joy.(2) I saw the joy in her smiling face.(3) Tears of joy streamed down her face.(4) She discovered the joy of writing.(5) I joy to see you so successful.(6) She smiled and could not hold back tears of joy.(7) A smile expressed her joy at the news.
(1) 他沉浸在巨大的欢乐之中。(2) 从她的笑脸上我看到欢欣。(3) 喜悦的泪水从她的脸上流下来。(4) 她感到了写作的乐趣。(5) 我看到你如此成功而感到欣慰。(6) 她笑了起来，禁不住流下喜悦的眼泪。(7) 微笑表达了她对这个消息的喜悦心情。

translation: n.法官；裁判v.断定；判断；审判
examples: (1) He is an impartial judge.(2) At the end of the trial, the judge summed up.(3) The judges' decision is final.(4) I judge him to be about 40.(5) You can't judge a book by its cover.(6) He's too young to judge which is better.(7) He will judge the case solely on its merits.
(1) 他是一位公正的法官。(2) 审讯结束后,法官作了总结。(3) 裁判的决定为最终决定。(4) 我断定他有40来岁。(5) 不能根据封面判断一本书(不可以貌取人)(6) 他太年轻, 不能判断哪一个更好。(7) 他将完全根据是非曲直审理这一案件。

translation: n.判断；判决；审判；评价；意见
examples: (1) Her decision seems to show a lack of political judgement.(2) Politicians should not engage in business affairs that might affect their political judgement.(3) My judgement was frequently faulty, but my loyalty to the nation could not be questioned.(4) The judgement passed against him.(5) We are waiting for God's dreadful judgement.(6) The disaster was seen as a judgement from on high.(7) He refused to make a judgement about the situation.(8) In my judgement, we should accept their apology.
(1) 她的决定似乎显示出缺乏政治判断力。(2) 政治家不应该参与那些可能会影响其政治判断力的商业事务。(3) 我的判断经常出错，但是我对祖国的忠诚是无可置疑的。(4) 判决宣告他败诉。(5) 我们在等待上帝令人生畏的审判。(6) 这一灾难被视为上天的惩罚。(7) 他拒绝对形势作出评价。(8) 依我看，我们应该接受他们的道歉。

translation: adj.多汁的；利润丰厚的；有趣的
examples: (1) I really have a yen for a nice, juicy apple.(2) There are some fresh juicy oranges.(3) All the same, Mr Thackwray added: “I would be disappointed if I couldn’t point to a big juicy deal by Christmas.(4) What a letdown! That is not as juicy as I thought.
(1) 我真想吃一只味甜多汁的苹果。(2) 那边有些新鲜多汁的橙子。(3) 尽管如此，撒克里补充道：“如果不能在圣诞节前证明这是一项利润丰厚的交易，我会感到很失望。”(4) 太令人失望了！不如我想像的那么有趣。

translation: adj.丛林的；垃圾的n.丛林；密林
examples: (1) We should have cut away the jungle brush.(2) This jungle juice will knock you for a loop.(3) There's not much jungle 100 miles inland.(4) The new road was hacked out of the jungle.(5) The scientist discovered the plant in the most inaccessible reaches of the jungle.(6) A bull elephant was rampaging about in the jungle.
(1) 我们本应该把丛林的灌木砍掉。(2) 你喝了这种烈酒会醉倒的。(3) 向内地100英里处丛林较少。(4) 这条新路是在丛林地带开辟出来的。(5) 这位科学家在丛林深处最难进入的区域发现了这种植物。(6) 一头雄象在丛林里横冲直撞。

translation: adj.资历较浅的；年少的；下级的n.晚辈；三年级生；年少者；地位较低者
examples: (1) I started the job as a junior secretary.(2) The president was so young that he was junior to some of his employees.(3) He likes to lord it over the junior staff.(4) She ranks as my junior in the clan.(5) You see, I am a sophomore and Miss Yang is a junior.
(1) 刚开始这份工作时，我是初级秘书。(2) 总裁的年龄甚至是比他的一些雇员还小。(3) 他喜欢对下级职员逞威风。(4) 她的辈分比我小。(5) 你瞧，我是2年级的，杨小姐是三年级的。

translation: n.垃圾；废旧杂物；中国平底帆船vt.丢弃
examples: (1) Eating too much junk food is bad for your health.(2) I will throw away all of my useless junk.(3) The junk was piled up in the basement.(4) She likes to pick up some interesting junk in junk shops.(5) He threw away all the junk in the boot of the car.(6) The junk drifts gently with the current.(7) I suggest you junk the old car and buy a new one.(8) We're going to junk these computers because they are obsolete.
(1) 垃圾食品吃得太多对健康有害。(2) 我会扔掉我所有无用的垃圾。(3) 垃圾被堆放在地下室。(4) 她喜欢在旧货店买些有趣的旧货。(5) 他把汽车行李箱中所有废弃的旧物都扔了出去。(6) 帆船顺水缓慢地漂流着。(7) 我建议你把旧车扔了,买一辆新的吧。(8) 我们准备换掉这些计算机,因为都过时了。

translation: 邮寄宣传品,垃圾邮件
examples: (1) 邮寄宣传品,垃圾邮件

translation: n.垃圾食品；无营养食品
examples: (1) Eating too much junk food is bad for your health.(2) He squandered his pocket money on junk food.
(1) 垃圾食品吃得太多对健康有害。(2) 他浪费零用钱于垃圾食品。

translation: n.公平；公正；正义；司法；法官；法律制裁
examples: (1) I won't dispute the justice of his remarks.(2) Marriage is, first of all, a contract which must be governed by justice.(3) Justice triumphs in the end.(4) British justice works on the premise that an accused person is innocent until he's proved guilty.(5) The justice dismissed his evidence out of hand.(6) The police must do all they can to bring criminals to justice.
(1) 我不怀疑他的话是公平合理的。(2) 婚姻首先是一种契约，它必须以公正为制约。(3) 正义终将得胜。(4) 英国司法运作的前提是被告在被证明有罪之前是清白的。(5) 法官当即驳回了他的证据。(6) 警方必须竭尽全力追捕罪犯，将他们绳之以法。

translation: n. 羽绒滑雪衫；西装短外套；短上衣，夹克；土豆皮；书籍的护封；文件套，公文夹vt. 给…穿夹克；给…装护套；给…包上护封；〈口〉打
examples: He wore a pair of dark glasses and a jacket all day long.My jacket is made of otter skins.She wore a leather jacket studded with rhinestones.Jacket potatoes, ie potatoes baked without being peeled.I like the design on this book jacket.Around the engine cylinder is a water jacket.
他整天戴一副墨眼镜，穿一件短上衣。我的皮夹克是用水獭皮做的。她穿了一件镶有人造钻石的皮外套。带皮烤熟的土豆。我喜欢这本书的护封上的图案。围绕着发动机汽缸的是一个水套。

translation: n. 一月
examples: It's quite warm for January.I was born on January eleventh.The station will be operative again in January.
就一月份来说，天气相当暖和了。我生于一月十一日。该车站将于一月份恢复使用。

translation: n. 日本（东亚国家名）
examples: They took a trip to Japan last year.The volume of trade with Japan has increased.
他们去年去日本旅行。与日本的贸易额增加了。

translation: adj. 日本（人）的；日语的n. 日本人；日语
examples: The last Japanese thrusts had been hurled back.The Japanese were beating the West at its own game.It takes years to gain a mastery of Japanese.She can speak Japanese as well as English.The Japanese planted a flag on Di oy Island.In Italy Japanese manga are very famous.Korea was colonized for a time by the Japanese.Japanese houses are chiefly composed of wood.His interest in learning Japanese has petered out.Her familiarity with Japanese surprised me.
日本人最后的突击被打退了。其时，日本人在效法西方并不断赶上和超越西方。掌握日语要花几年时间。她会说日语和英语。日本的国旗上埋设了钓鱼岛。在意大利日本的漫画很有名。朝鲜曾一度沦为日本人的殖民地。日本人的房子主要由木头造成。他学习日语的兴趣逐渐消失了。她对日语的熟谙使我惊奇。

translation: n. 吉普车
examples: An old jeep is putter along the road.They rode up the hill in a jeep.
一辆旧吉普车沿路迤逦而来。他们坐了一辆吉普车往山上开去。

translation: n. 工作；职业vt. 承包；代客买卖vi. 做零工n. (Job)人名；(英)乔布；(法、葡)若布；(?-1605)约伯〈俄〉俄罗斯正教会莫斯科牧首。；(德、塞、捷、荷、意)约布
examples: I do get a job in a travel agency.He lost his job during the great depression.His present job seemed to be a blind alley.Why are you out of job for such a long time?Bob and I were rivals for the job.It promised to be a difficult job.I've got various jobs around the house to do.Raising money is your job.It's the job of the church to help people lead better lives.The theft must have been an inside job.The gang pulled off a bank job in St. Louis.It's real wood,not one of those plastic jobs.
我真的在旅行社找了份工作。他在大萧条时期失业了。他现在的职业看来没什么前途。你为何失业这么久?鲍勃和我是这一职位的竞争者。看来这是一项困难的任务。我在家里有各种各样的活儿要干。筹集资金是你的任务。帮助人们生活得好些是教会的责任。这一窃案一定是内部人干的。那个犯罪团伙在圣路易斯抢劫了一家银行。这是实木的，不是那种塑料产品。

translation: vt. 参加；结合；连接vi. 加入；参加；结合n. 结合；连接；接合点n. (Join)人名；(法)茹安
examples: The island is joined to the mainland by a bridge.The two estates join at the foot of the hill.If you join the club, you must abide by its rules.He was asked many times to join the party, but he always kept his distance.He joined us in the discussion yesterday.Mary has just joined her family in Australia.Mother joins me in sending you our best wishes.
岛上有座桥与大陆相连。这两处房地产在山脚下相毗连。你参加这个俱乐部就得遵守其规章。人家好几次要他参加那个政党，但他的反应总是很冷淡。他昨天参加了我们的讨论。玛丽不久前刚和她的家人在澳大利亚团聚。我母亲和我一起向你表示美好的祝愿。

translation: n. 玩笑，笑话；笑柄vt. 开…的玩笑vi. 开玩笑n. (Joke)人名；(英)乔克；(塞)约凯
examples: He closed his speech with a funny joke.I'm sorry but I can't see the joke.It is no joke.He can't take a joke.He's someone I have an occasional chat and joke with.You must be joking.Are you joking with us?
他用一则有趣的笑话结束了演讲。很抱歉,我看不出来有什么可笑的。这可不是开玩笑的事。他开不得玩笑。我偶然跟他闲聊，一起说笑话。你一定是在开玩笑吧。你一定是在笑话我们吧？

translation: n. 新闻工作者；报人；记日志者
examples: This journalist's works are popular among young people.The journalist was probing into several financial scandals.He is not so much a journalist as a writer.His passport says he is a journalist.
这位新闻记者的著作很受年轻人的欢迎。那记者正在调查几起财务丑闻。与其说他是个新闻工作者, 不如说他是个作家。他的护照说他是一个新闻工作者。

translation: n. 旅行；行程vi. 旅行n. (Journey)人名；(英)朱尼，朱妮(女名)
examples: It was a long journey, but we eventually arrived.He told a very descriptive account of his journey.He is going to make a long journey.Let him continue on his journey.They will journey across the continent in less than four hours.He wishes to journey round the world.
旅程很长，但我们最后还是到达了。他对旅行作了十分生动的叙述。他要作一次长途旅行。让他继续他的行程吧。不到四个小时，他们就穿越了这个大陆。他希望周游世界。

translation: n. （水果）汁，液；果汁
examples: I like to drink coconut juice.She was drinking juice through a straw.Give the bottle a couple of shakes before pouring the juice.Would you like some tomato juice?She often stews the potatos in meat juice.The main function of intestinal juice is decomposing, and digesting food.We ran out of juice on the motorway.I just don't have the juice anymore.She juiced an orange for her breakfast.Certain scenes were juiced up for commercial purposes.
我喜欢喝椰子汁。她正在用吸管喝果汁。倒果汁前，先把瓶子摇几下。你想要些番茄汁吗？她常用肉汁炖土豆。肠液的主要功能是分解消化食物。我们在高速公路上行驶时汽油用完了。我再也没有那个精力了。她用一只橙子榨汁作早餐饮料。出于商业目的,一些广告场景变得很有吸引力。

translation: n. 七月
examples: July is the hottest month in a year in my hometown.The maximum temperature in July may be 36 Celsius degree.He will leave at the end of term, to wit 30 July.The Forth of July is the National Independence Day of the USA.I will be no more a senior high school student come next July.I start shearing the sheep at the beginning of July.What did the suspect do on July ninth?According to the treaty, China is to take back Hong Kong on July 1st,  1997.
在我的家乡，七月是一年里最热的一月。七月份最高温度可能达到36摄氏度。他要在期末离开，也就是7月30日。七月四日是美国国庆日。当明年七月来到时，我就不再是高中生了。我一般在7月初开始剪羊毛。嫌疑犯在七月九日做了什么事情？根据条约，中国将于1997年7月1日收回香港。

translation: n. 跳跃；暴涨；惊跳vt. 跳跃；使跳跃；跳过；突升vi. 跳跃；暴涨；猛增n. (Jump)人名；(英)江普
examples: If a horse refuses a jump,penalty points are added to the score.The athlete made a superb jump.The loud bang made me jump.The jump in food prices gave rise to a lot of complaint.The horse was behaving fractiously and refused to jump.He jumped to his feet and ran out of the office.The horse jumped the fence.Last week, the price of food jumped.
如果马拒绝跳跃，是要扣分的。运动运做了一个出色的跳跃。砰的一声巨响吓了我一跳。食品价格的猛涨引起了许多不满。这匹马很倔强，拒绝跳越。他一下子跳了起来，跑出了办公室。那匹马跃过了栅栏。上星期食品价格突涨。

translation: n. 六月；琼（人名，来源于拉丁语，含义是“年轻气盛的六月”）
examples: This weather is exceptional for June.He started work here last June.She came in June, when it was very hot.This tender should be submitted by June 26th.The campaign lasted from June to October.Please hand in your paper before June thirtieth.If there's any news June will soon sniff it out.June was good at figure skating.
六月里这样的天气是反常的。他是去年六月开始在这里工作的。她六月来，那时天气非常热。此投标书应于六月二十六日前提交。这次战役从6月进行到10月。请在六月三十日前交论文。只要有新闻，琼总是会马上知道的。琼善于花样滑冰。

translation: adv. 只是，仅仅；刚才，刚刚；正好，恰好；实在；刚要adj. 公正的，合理的；正直的，正义的；正确的；公平的；应得的n. (Just)人名；(英)贾斯特；(法)朱斯特；(德、匈、波、捷、挪)尤斯特；(西)胡斯特
examples: This is the thing you just left.I am just teasing you; you need not be nervous.I'm sorry, but I am just on my way out.To our great joy, your goods arrived just in time.I am just starving.Our aim is a just and lasting peace.Many Americans no longer viewed it as a just war.You have received a just reward.We made a just assessment of the situation.
这是您刚才忘在这里的东西。我仅仅是在跟你闹着玩,你不要紧张。很抱歉,我正好要出门。令我们欣喜若狂的是,你的物资来的正是时候。我真的要饿死了。我们的目标是维持一个公平而持久和平的世界。许多美国人不再认为那是一场正义的战争。你已得到了应有的报酬。我们对形势作了精确的评估。

translation: 加入；参加
examples: They are going to join in the singing.He never joined in the usual sports of the boys.I'll persuade him to join our club.They tried to get a foot in the door.
他们将参加唱歌。他从不参加孩子们的一般体育活动。我将劝他加入我们的俱乐部。他们试图加入进来。

translation: 联合起来；连接；参军
examples: The new firm linked up with several big ones.Let us join forces to fight them.He was called up at the beginning of the war.The government is calling up men for the army.
这家新公司和几家大公司联合起来了。让我们联合起来跟他们斗。战争开始时他就被征召入伍了。政府正在征召入伍。

translation: 刚才；眼下
examples: He had a drink in the bar just now.Please sum up what you said just now.The boss is being in royal spirits right now.Now he slept quietly with his fathers.
他刚才在酒吧间喝了一杯。请把你刚才说的总结一下。此刻，老板情绪极好。此刻他安静地躺在祖坟中。
